comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "M. E. Keath, a steeplejack from Lake Alfred, spent most of this morning atop the flagpole on the Capitol dome repainting and making repairs. Keath, who is 62, has been painting the pole regularly over the years. Total height of the pole from the ground is 120 feet."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
